Hi!

We will use Orange Pi for Image Processing.

OrangePiPc836×722 346 KB

Is this Orange Pi PC good for Image Processing. Product No: 16568. Thanks for your help!

ibrahimomer:

16568

That looks like a much older version and I doubt it will work well for vision. Try to get an Orange Pi 5. This board works well with Photonvision.
